screen.description: Screen root display port for linux-wallpaperengine. Use xrandr in an x11 session to find.

wallpaperDir.tooltip: Specify the directory containing your wallpapers.

shuffleInterval.tooltip: Set the time interval (in minutes) for the wallpaper to change.

disableMouse.tooltip: Prevent changing wallpapers with mouse actions.

currentStatus.description: Current Status of the Wallpaper Shuffle Applet

currentWallpaper.tooltip: The path or ID of the currently displayed wallpaper.

previousWallpaper.tooltip: The path or ID of the previously displayed wallpaper.

queueLength.tooltip: Total number of wallpapers in the shuffle queue.

currentIndex.tooltip: The current position of the wallpaper in the shuffle queue.

shuffleStatus.tooltip: Indicates whether the shuffle timer is active or stopped.

logFile.tooltip: Path to the file where logs will be saved.
